amendatorysection.chaptername: State University, State Colleges, and Postsecondary Education
amendatorysection.catchline: First responder or eligible disabled person; tuition waiver; limitation.
amendatorysection.para: A first responder or an eligible disabled person may receive a tuition waiver for up to five years if he or she otherwise continues to be eligible for participation under sections 85-2611 to 85-2614.
